data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Baker.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Baker, United States Minor Outlying Islands
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help the 40 believers in Baker to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Baker, United States Minor Outlying Islands to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Baker, United States Minor Outlying Islands to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Baker.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Baker, United States Minor Outlying Islands need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Baker, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.focus_label: Baker, United States Minor Outlying Islands
data.section_summary:
the state of Baker, United States Minor Outlying Islands has a population of 100.

We estimate Baker has 40 people who might know Jesus, 58 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
